data.title: Fuel Good Day 2019
data.text:
UPDATE: Thank you, thank you, thank you! This year’s Fuel Good Day has been the most successful to date with more than $685,000 being raised for more than 180 local charities and non-profit organizations across Western Canada. Since launching in 2017, you have helped raise nearly $1.9 million to invest in our communities and support their growth.

Tell your friends, family, neighbours, hairdresser, dentist – everyone! Get down to your local Co-op Gas Bar on Sept. 17 to fill up and FUEL GOOD.

Fill up your tank on Sept. 17, 2019, at a Co-op Gas Bar* in Western Canada, and Co-op will donate a minimum of five cents per litre of fuel purchased to a registered charity or non-profit organization of the local Co-op’s choice. This includes all grades of gasoline and diesel fuel.

Proceeds from Fuel Good Day benefit local schools, community centres, libraries, hospitals, food banks and more.

View the full list of organizations supported by your local Co-op.

*Available at participating Co-op Gas Bars.

Fuel Good Day 2018

Last year, Fuel Good Day raised more than $600,000 for over 180 local organizations and causes across Western Canada – all in a single day.

More than 400 Co-op Gas Bars throughout British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba and northwest Ontario participated.

While individual donation amounts ranged based on Co-op size and trading area, every penny positively impacted communities across Western Canada. From corner to corner and points between, the Co-operative Retailing System truly got on board for Fuel Good Day.

This year, make sure to visit your local participating Co-op Gas Bar on Sept. 17 to be part of this special initiative and fuel good.
